title: DECOCOLOR Paint MRKR
features: DecoColor(R) paint marker is permanent, opaque, acrylic-based and high gloss
description: DecoColor(R) paint marker is permanent, opaque, acrylic-based and high gloss. These paint markers are for use on glass, metal, porcelain, stone, paper, wood and most plastics. This package contains one each of gold, silver, metallic blue and metallic green. Imported.
